Text: MeOH Plant StatusMethanol Plant is still on target to begin making spec methanol on Friday July The plant may start taking some natural gas late Tuesday July Because of dredging at the Oxy dock no barges can be loaded July to August

NATURAL GAS NOMINATION FOR DECEMBER R E V I S I O Nrevise the natural gas nomination for the MTBE Plant for December as follows mmbtu for the first days of the month mmbut for the last half of the month Forwarded by Maritta MulletGPGFINEnron on PM Maritta Mullet PM To David NRON Mark NRON Steven M CT Daren J CT Paul NRON David M NRON Robert E CT Anita CT Gregg CT Thomas NRON Michael NRON John L CT Lee L CT James NRON Kerry NRON Sally NRON cc Subject NATURAL GAS NOMINATION FOR DECEMBER Enron Methanol nominates the following natural gas requirements for the Methanol Plant for December mmbtu per day EGPFC nominates the following natural gas requirements for the MTBE Plant at Morgans Point for December mmbtu per day for the first days of the month None for the last half of the month MTBE plant will be down after December

NATURAL GAS NOMINATION FOR DECEMBER Methanol nominates the following natural gas requirements for the Methanol Plant for December mmbtu per day EGPFC nominates the following natural gas requirements for the MTBE Plant at Morgans Point for December mmbtu per day for the first days of the month None for the last half of the month MTBE plant will be down after December
Methanol Plant Statusnow appears the Methanol Plant will be up making product about July

MEOH PLANT STATUSMethanol plant has determined extensive repairs are needed including replacement of piping and retubing of of the preheat exchangers It appears that the plant will be down until the last week of the month At a minimum the plant will be down until the middle of next week A better estimate of downtime will be available by tomorrow afternoon

MeOH UPSETMeOH plant began having problems on June On July a flange fire on piping occurred The piping could not be depressured and the plant was shut down No eta for plant startup is available at this time Additional information will be forwarded when available

MTBE PLANT LIGHTNING STRIKES AGAINMTBE Plant took another lightning strike about pm on Saturday June The Plant is coming back up and expects to reach temperatures to start making some product about midnight tonight June
MTBE UPSETSplant is up and running Production for Tuesday May was in excess of MB

MTBE PLANT SHUTDOWNMTBE plant went down about am on Saturday morning May as a result of power failure Apparently lightning knocked out the power substation The oleflex is starting up along with the MTBE plant and butamer Some production is expected tonight with full rains possibly attained tomorrow

NATURAL GAS NOMINATION FOR Methanol nominates the following natural gas requirements for the Methanol Plant for May mmbtu per day EGPFC nominates the following natural gas requirements for the MTBE plant at Morgans Point for May mmbtu per day

MTBE UPSETSMTBE plant has determined full production can be attained sooner than their first forecast Production at the MTBE plant remains approximately MBD today and tomorrow then MBD on Thursday March and MBD starting Friday March
MeOH UpsetsMethanol Plant is up and making spec product Rates will be increased to full rates on Thursday March if oxygen is available

MTBE PLANT UPSETMTBE plant will continue operating at lower production rates of approximately MBD to MBD until April or at the earliest It will possibly be midApril before full production can be resumed This is the result of the steam boiler problem experienced on Friday March When more information is available this will be updated
MEOH UPSETearliest time production of MeOH may begin is now Sunday evening
MTBE UPSETMTBE plant had an upset early today and a steam boiler is being taken out of service Production will be cut back to approximately MBD to MBD for four to five days
METHANOL PLANT UPSETMethanol Plant went down about am today It is expected to be down until late Friday March

NATURAL GAS NOMINATION FOR Methanol nominates the following natural gas requirements for the Methanol Plant for May mmbtu per day EGPFC nominates the following natural gas requirements for the MTBE plant at Morgans Point for May mmbtu per day
